DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study learn gait ( walk ) characteristic MPS IVA possible change gait enzyme replacement therapy .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose 3-year study conduct longitudinal investigation use motion analysis gait objectively quantitatively assess gait characteristic MPS IVA patient . Data document gait characteristic abnormality gather patient initiate enzyme replacement therapy . Inclusion criterion Individuals MPS IVA diagnose enzyme molecular study Exclusion Criteria Individual MPS IVA previously enrol BMN-110 Individual non-ambulatory The individual unable complete longitudinal study visit least yearly
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis MPS IVA Nonambulatory Previous enrol clinical trial BMN110
